items.name: Causal Exit Meta-Policy
items.description: Hyper policy blending causal regime + volatility pathways.

items.name: Multi-Objective Route Optimizer
items.description: Pareto-optimal exit routing over fee/slippage/latency risk.

items.name: Probabilistic Fill Orchestrator
items.description: Bayesian fill-probability control for urgent/non-urgent exits.

items.name: Adversarial Slippage Defense
items.description: Stress-test and harden exits against worst-case book movement.

items.name: Cross-Agent Capital Shield
items.description: Global kill-risk synchronization across all execution agents.

items.name: Real-Time Exit RL Guardrails
items.description: Constrained RL tuner under strict capital-protection boundaries.

items.name: Path-Dependent Risk Compiler
items.description: Compile multi-hop state into deterministic exit policy constraints.

items.name: Market Microstructure Profiler
items.description: Use microstructure signatures to optimize close timing.

items.name: MCP Federated Control Plane
items.description: Bidirectional MCP orchestration for tool-assisted exit decisions.

items.name: Deterministic Recovery Graph
items.description: Automated recovery graph for degraded venues and partial failures.
